document.discussion_title: New Bedford: Rep. Cabral holds office hours
document.topic_text: New Bedford: Rep. Cabral holds office hours southcoasttoday.com Posted Apr. 25, 2016 @ 12:42 pm Posted Apr. 25, 2016 @ 12:42 pm » Social News NEW BEDFORD — Rep. Antonio F.D. Cabral (D-New Bedford) will hold monthly office hours from 10 a.m. to noon, Saturday, May 7, at the Howland Green Branch Library, 3 Rodney French Blvd. No appointments are necessary. Office hours will be held once a month on Saturday at this location. If you cannot attend, Rep. Cabral is available Monday through Friday at the State House in Boston. You may call 617-722-2017 to arrange a meeting. You may also call his New Bedford district office at 508-997-8113. southcoasttoday.com Posted Apr. 25, 2016 @ 12:42 pm » Comment or view comments
